requirement_designation: Science, Nature and Technology with Lab
course_description: Students will learn several methods for separating and identifying small organic molecules. They will make qualitative determinations based on quantitative data and investigate kinetics and thermodynamics associated with reactions. Students who withdraw from the laboratory course must withdraw from the co-requisite lecture course. *Exceptions to the withdrawal policy require Chemistry Department approval.
prerequisites: CHEM_OX 141 or (CHEM_OX 150 and CHEM_OX 150L) as prerequisites and CHEM_OX 202 as co-requisite, or equivalent transfer credit.
